content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the trend in categories three and four from the first period to the second period?

choices.label: The percentage of crimes categorized as ecclesiastical matters increased, while the percentage of crimes categorized as sexual misconduct decreased.
The percentage of crimes categorized as ecclesiastical matters decreased, while the percentage of crimes categorized as sexual misconduct increased.
The percentage of crimes categorized as ecclesiastical matters decreased, while the percentage of crimes categorized as sexual misconduct remained the same.
The percentage of crimes categorized as ecclesiastical matters remained the same, while the percentage of crimes categorized as sexual misconduct increased.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
